item.description: Price: (as of – Details) — OVERVIEW — – High quality cowhide, 100% handmade (cutting, dyeing, stitching…) – 10 COLORS, CUSTOM NAME/TEXT/IMAGE… ENGRAVING — CUSTOMIZATION — – With an extra charge of US $5/each name/initials/image… in each side, personalized request will be made as your idea. – We accept request for re-structure products, make as ... item.content:encoded:
Price: $34.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:12:13 UTC – Details)



— OVERVIEW —
– High quality cowhide, 100% handmade (cutting, dyeing, stitching…)
– 10 COLORS, CUSTOM NAME/TEXT/IMAGE… ENGRAVING

— CUSTOMIZATION —
– With an extra charge of US $5/each name/initials/image… in each side, personalized request will be made as your idea.
– We accept request for re-structure products, make as sample or any specials request. Please reach us for more details.

— SHIPPING —
– Order will be completed within 03 to 05 working days after payment has been made. Normal shipping time is approximately 02 to 04 weeks (excluded public holidays) depending on your location.

— GENERAL NOTES —
– Each of our product is uniquely designed and handcrafted. At Unik4art, uniqueness is highly valued.
– Cowhide are widely used in our products. Kindly be aware that marks and random scars are naturally parts of original leather.
– Color of product may vary slightly compared to actual products upon receipt as cowhide is totally dyed by hand. We have 10 colors for you as final photo.
– The engraving text/image is always black, so that the darker the color, the less outstanding it is.
– If you don’t note us about the details position, the name/text will be engraved with the font Arial, on the right corner.

Should you have further questions, additional requests for your orders, please do not hesitate to reach us by leaving a comment at “Note to Seller”. We will quickly response you within 12 hours.

Enjoy Shopping!

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 6, 2020
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B085LJZV96

Price: $34.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:12:13 UTC – Details)

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Watch Sizing Guide Transition from the board room to evening drinks wearing this Anne Klein watch. Round gold-tone metal case. Gold-tone shark mesh bracelet. Jewelry clasp closure. Three-hand analog display with quartz movement. Navy blue sunray dial face features gold-tone hands, stick index hour marks at 3, 6, and 9’oclock, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $85.00 - $33.46
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:17 UTC – Details)


Watch Sizing Guide Transition from the board room to evening drinks wearing this Anne Klein watch. Round gold-tone metal case. Gold-tone shark mesh bracelet. Jewelry clasp closure. Three-hand analog display with quartz movement. Navy blue sunray dial face features gold-tone hands, stick index hour marks at 3, 6, and 9’oclock, diamond hour marker, and brand name. Water resistance up to 3 ATM/30 meters. Presentation box included. Imported. Measurements: Case Height: 26 mm Case Width: 26 mm Case Depth: 9 mm Band Width: 11 mm Band Circumference/Length: 8 in Weight: 1.2 oz
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 3.82 x 3.11 x 2.91 inches; 4.8 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ AK/3002RGRG
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 21, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ AK Anne Klein
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B071LPHH2Y
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Rose gold-tone mesh bracelet with adjustable end links; jewelry clasp and two extenders
Japanese-quartz Movement
Case Diameter: 26mm
Water resistant to 30 m (100ft): in general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming or bathing

Key assortment features

Genuine Leather

Chic and classic, these watches are comfortable, easy to wear, and display an air of everyday charm.

Premium Crystals

Classic styles are upgraded with premium crystal accents for just the right amount of sparkle.

Ceramic

Sleek and durable, ceramic watches are stylish statement pieces designed to inspire.

Diamond Accents

Featuring genuine diamond accents on the dial, these watches have a chic, elevated evening look.

4.5
Price: $85.00 - $33.46
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:17 UTC – Details)
